title: What is the perfect time to start losing weight?
itunes:title: What is the perfect time to start losing weight?
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

Waiting for perfect means not starting. Every year we wait until after the holidays, for spring, for the kids to get out school, after vacation, for the kids to get back to school and before we know it...it's the holidays!

Guess what? There's no perfect time, so I'll teach you how to think about this poison thought so you can start now.
